name: 1 Chance.
description:
Welcome to 1 Chance. An App experience like no other.

There are 14 mini games to play, you must use your speed, intelligence and dexterity to complete them all, but there is a twist... You can only play once!

The pressure is on, will you be the global champion.

*14 varied mini games
*Minimalist design and aesthetic
*Global Leaderboards
*A unique gaming experience like non other

"You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow.
This opportunity comes once in a lifetime"
